nicadavischarity: Tears because I too smile because I know they don't want to hear it...all I've heard is your not better yet...how do I explain I pain so deep that you just want out...you just want it to stop ...but it's not like the pain of a cut that will heal in a week's time ...it lingers and lingers and at time nothing makes me feel good not even the food that I use to try and fell better ...I so understand and I love you for being you ...I'm a mother and a wife and I've learned how to pretend for them sigh..my daughter only 5 breaks my heart when she says mommy your not well again ...I will be waiting to read your post and share in the comfort that I'm not alone even though it feels like it...
